name: Faber Park Banks
description: Mellow banks and smooth ledges in a quiet park setting. Low-key spot that rarely gets crowded.
history: A local favorite since the early 2000s. The concrete banks were originally landscaping features that skaters adopted.
bestTimes: Anytime — this spot is rarely busy.
transitDirections: SIR to Port Richmond, short walk north.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include banks, ledges, flat ground. Urban architecture repurposed for skating.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Staten Island skate scene in Port Richmond. A local favorite since the early 2000s. The concrete banks were originally landscaping features that skaters adopted.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: SIR to Port Richmond, short walk north.. Anytime — this spot is rarely busy.
detailedNotes.warnings: Street spot — be respectful of the space and watch for security.
